item.title: Hugo To The Rescue
item.description: Earlier this year I decided to reactivate my site’s blog section. Turns out things are not going pretty well. First, I’ve clean-installed my computer and forgot to install my trusty website generator app, Mixture. Second, Mixture developer discontinued the app and took it down from the website. Well, I’m screwed. After playing with several static site generators listed at StaticGen, I am now trying to get along with Hugo. Why I choose Hugo?

item.title: That1Guy Transmitting Straight From The Buttnoggin Tour Poster
item.description: Poster illustration for That1Guy Transmitting Straight From The Buttnoggin Tour. Check him out. *Poster mockup by Mike Delsing.

item.title: That1Guy Rainbows on Demand Tour Poster
item.description: An illustration for That1Guy’s tour titled Rainbows on Demand. Check him out *Poster mockup by Pixelentity.

item.title: Automàtico - Nadie Es El Mismo Album Cover Illustration
item.description: Music album cover illustration for an album by Buenos Aires based disco-rock/punk band Automàtico. Check them out.

item.title: Ray of Victory Wolfmother Postcard
item.description: Postcard illustration for Wolfmother postcard illustration contest at CreativeAllies. *Postcard mockup by Kevin May.

item.title: That1Guy - The Great Crazy 80 Show Tour Poster
item.description: Poster illustration for That1Guy tour titled The Great Crazy 80 Show. Check him out.

item.title: Legend of The Guardians Poster Fan Art
item.description: Another attempt to re-create a movie poster. This time is for a movie called Legend of The Guardians: The Owls of Ga’Hoole.

item.title: Heima Film Poster Fan Art
item.description: An attempt to re-create a poster for a film called Heima by Sigur Rós.

item.title: Still Too Far
item.description: What if a polar bear decides to take a few days off to enjoy a hot sunny sun bath at California beach? Well, I guess this is one part of its journey… hitch-hiking.

item.title: Take Care, Take Care
item.description: A practice piece for exploring minimal colour detailing and perspective drawing. This piece is available for sale on my Redbubble store as prints, stickers, stationeries, home decorations and also phone and tablet cases.

item.title: Gentle Man
item.description: There’s always a gentle side in each and everyone of us. This lion and butterfly piece is available as prints, apparel, stationeries, and home decorations at my Redbubble store.

item.title: Swift Migration
item.description: Inspired by NES classic title Balloon Fight, this whale discovers a better way to migrate. The swift migrating whale piece is available as prints, apparel, phone and tablet cases, stationeries, and home decorations at my Redbubble store.

item.title: Get In Touch
item.description: Drop an email by using the form below for inquiries, project discussions or general discussions. You may also send me a message through UpWork for project discussions.

item.title: Get To Know
item.description: I’m Dyota Pratyaksa, a self-taught illustrator from Semarang, Indonesia. I do illustrations for apparel, prints, and screen purpose projects. My illustrations ranged from cartoon to semi-realistic (comic-like) look. I’m open to any kind of style, but I tend to work with heavy ink line details and minimal colors as my standard. When I’m not working on illustration projects, I do other stuff like layout designs for web and prints, blog writing, and English to Indonesian translation/localization.
